question: Formula 1: Who will finish ahead at the 2022 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix: Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc?
description:
This is a market on the higher placed finisher at the 2022 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix, Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc. The race takes place over 63 laps of the 4.909-kilometre Autodromo Enzo e Dino Ferrari in Italy, commonly known as Imola and former home of the San Marino GP, on Sunday, April 24.

The market will resolve to “Max Verstappen” if Max Verstappen finishes ahead of Charles Leclerc, and “Charles Leclerc” if Charles Leclerc finishes ahead of Max Verstappen. 

Note:
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Charles Leclerc does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Max Verstappen”. 
- If Charles Leclerc finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Charles Leclerc”. 
- If neither Charles Leclerc nor Max Verstappen finish the race before May 1 (11 PM ET), then the market will resolve to 50-50. 
- If for any reason the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before May 1, 2022, the same market conditions will apply.

question: Will $ETH be above $3,000 on May 1, 2022?
description:
This is a market on if the price of Ethereum (ETH) will be above $3,000 in USD on May 1, 2022 (12 PM ET). 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ethereum ($ETH) has a candlestick closing price of $3,000.01 or more, as per the resolution source, on May 1, 2022, 12pm ET, and “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum).

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Sun 1 May 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.

The check will be at 12:30 PM ET, May 1, 2022.

question: Will Tyson Fury KO/TKO/RTD Dillian Whyte?
description:
This is a market on whether Tyson Fury will KO/TKO/RTD Dillian Whyte during the upcoming WBC Heavyweight championship fight, set to take place on April 23, 2022. Tyson Fury is defending this title.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Tyson Fury wins by KO/TKO/RTD and "No" otherwise.

If the fight is rescheduled to a time and date on or before April 30, 2022, the same rules will apply. If the fight is postponed to a date after April 30, 2022, or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the floor price of Moonbirds be 30 ETH or more on May 15, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether PROOF Collective's Moonbirds will have a floor price of 30 ETH or more on May 15, 2022 (at 12:00 PM ET), according to https://opensea.io/collection/proof-moonbirds.  

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there are no Moonbirds* listed for sale for less than 30 ETH on the official Moonbirds collection page on OpenSea. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".  

*Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market. List time for an NFT can be found under “Trading History” by clicking the “Listing” filter and hovering over the date.  

Note that the exact price at the check time will be used. If no floor price is available at the check time, the source will be checked every following hour. For valid listings that are declining price auctions, the price exactly at the check time will be used, NOT the price at the initial listing time.
